Brookhaven.WAGA-TV: WAGA-TV, virtual channel 5 (UHF digital channel 27), is a Fox owned-and-operated television station licensed to Atlanta, Georgia, United States. Owned by the Fox Television Stations subsidiary of 21st Century Fox, WAGA-TV maintains studio and transmitter facilities located on Briarcliff Road in unincorporated DeKalb County, just outside the Atlanta city limits (but with an Atlanta mailing address). On cable, the station is available in standard definition on Comcast Xfinity channel 4 and Charter Spectrum channel 5, and in high definition on Xfinity channel 804 and Spectrum channel 705.
